verses.text: The \w word|strong="H1697"\w* which came unto \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* from the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, when \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto him \w Pashur|strong="H6583"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Melchiah|strong="H4441"\w*, and \w Zephaniah|strong="H6846"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Maaseiah|strong="H4641"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Enquire|strong="H1875"\w*, I pray thee, of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* for \w us|strong="H1157"\w*; for \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* maketh \w war|strong="H3898"\w* against us; if so be that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* will \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* with us according to all his wondrous \w works|strong="H6381"\w*, that he may go \w up|strong="H5927"\w* from us.
¶ Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Jeremiah|strong="H3414"\w* unto them, Thus shall ye \w say|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w*:

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; Behold, I will turn \w back|strong="H5437"\w* the \w weapons|strong="H3627"\w* of \w war|strong="H4421"\w* that \add are\add* in your \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, wherewith ye \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and \add against\add* the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*, which \w besiege|strong="H6696"\w* you \w without|strong="H2351"\w* the \w walls|strong="H2346"\w*, and I will \w assemble|strong="H0622"\w* them into the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

And I myself will \w fight|strong="H3898"\w* against you with an \w outstretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* and with a \w strong|strong="H2389"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, even in \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and in \w fury|strong="H2534"\w*, and in \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w*.

And I will \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of this \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, both \w man|strong="H0120"\w* and \w beast|strong="H0929"\w*: they shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* of a \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*.

And \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I will \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w Zedekiah|strong="H6667"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and such as are \w left|strong="H7604"\w* in this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* from the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, from the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and from the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Nebuchadrezzar|strong="H5019"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of those that \w seek|strong="H1245"\w* their \w life|strong="H5315"\w*: and he shall \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* them with the \w edge|strong="H6310"\w* of the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; he shall not \w spare|strong="H2347"\w* them, neither have \w pity|strong="H2550"\w*, nor have \w mercy|strong="H7355"\w*.

¶ And unto this \w people|strong="H5971"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* you the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w life|strong="H2416"\w*, and the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

He that \w abideth|strong="H3427"\w* in this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* shall \w die|strong="H4191"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and by the \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*, and by the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*: but he that goeth \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, and \w falleth|strong="H5307"\w* to the \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* that \w besiege|strong="H6696"\w* you, he shall \w live|strong="H2421"\w*, and his \w life|strong="H5315"\w* shall be unto him for a \w prey|strong="H7998"\w*.

For I have \w set|strong="H7760"\w* my \w face|strong="H6440"\w* against this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* for \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*, and not for \w good|strong="H2896"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: it shall be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w*, and he shall \w burn|strong="H8313"\w* it with \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

¶ And touching the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \add say\add*, \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w* ye the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*;

O \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; \w Execute|strong="H1777"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, and \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* \add him that is\add* \w spoiled|strong="H1497"\w* out of the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the \w oppressor|strong="H6231"\w*, lest my \w fury|strong="H2534"\w* go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* like \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, and \w burn|strong="H1197"\w* that none can \w quench|strong="H3518"\w* \add it\add*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w evil|strong="H7455"\w* of your \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*.\f + \fr 21.12 \ft Execute: Heb. Judge\f*

Behold, I \add am\add* against thee, O \w inhabitant|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w valley|strong="H6010"\w*, \add and\add* \w rock|strong="H6697"\w* of the \w plain|strong="H4334"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; which \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Who shall come \w down|strong="H5181"\w* against us? or who shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* into our \w habitations|strong="H4585"\w*?\f + \fr 21.13 \ft inhabitant: Heb. inhabitress\f*

But I will \w punish|strong="H6485"\w* you according to the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of your \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*: and I will \w kindle|strong="H3341"\w* a \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* in the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w* thereof, and it shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* all things round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* it.\f + \fr 21.14 \ft punish: Heb. visit upon\f*
